name: bike-maintenance-tracker
description: Bike maintenance tracker to add track wear on parts and service intervals

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: David Shaw
